description: Third year ME and NROTC midshipman from Danboro, PA. Fall '12 AM class, BK 1932. Huge fan of Philadelphia sports teams, and I love grabbin some cheesesteaks and goin down the shore. Penthouse resident that will be in  the house until I graduate. Have my private pilots license and enjoy flying. Research at the combustion lab. I love me some good beer. Go Jackets, Go Navy.
aspects: I love the brotherhood we have here, and I truly believe it is one of the best and strongest on campus. We all get along, and I love being able to count on brothers to help me out and being able to return the favor. Lambda Chi got me my research position, and has continued to open doors for me. Paired with ROTC, Lambda chi has already developed me into a better person and a better leader.
involve: Researcher at Ben T. Zinn Combustion Lab
quotes: "It matters not how strait the gate, how charged with punishments the scroll, I am the master of my fate: I am the captain of my soul" - Invictus, William Ernest Henley
name: Ben Marquis
